project.name: words
project.notes: This project contains blocks for exploring "word embeddings". By mapping words to vectors one can solve word analogy problems and much more. Supports 15 languages. Learn more at https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/AI-Teacher-Guide/chapter-5.html

custom-block.s: closest word to %l %br in language %txt %br not includng %l
map %repRing on each element of %l and %l
map %repRing on each element of %l and %l

custom-block.comment: You can add, substract, and multiply the features of words and then find the closest word to the result. In this example we compute the analogy man is to woman as father is to X. father-(man-woman)=X
CLICK THIS TO OPEN THE HELP PAGE
Can optionally change the default language for work embeddings, and speech input and output.

Retrieve 300 numbers for any of 20,000 words. The numbers are the result of training a machine learning system on billions of words. You can change the language to one of 15 supported languages. If no language is specified the default language is used.

custom-block.s: closest word to %l %br in language %txt %br not includng %l
custom-block.comment: Find the word whose numbers are closest to the features given unless in the list of exceptons. Language default is used if none specified. This is a simpler version of the following block

custom-block.s: closest word to %l %br in language %txt %br not includng %l
custom-block.comment: You can translate between languages too!

custom-block.s: closest word to %l %br in language %txt %br not includng %l %br and do as words are found %cmdRing %br with distance measure %txt
custom-block.comment: Full-featured version of 'closest word'. Find the word whose numbers are closest to the features given. Closeness can be measured as Euclidean distance or cosine similarity. Try changing the measure and see if it makes a difference.

custom-block.s: all words in language %txt with features
custom-block.comment: Get all the words loaded into the system for a language.

custom-block.s: closest word to %l %br in language %txt %br not includng %l
map %repRing on each element of %l and %l
closest words to %l in language %txt %br and include distances %b
custom-block.comment: Reports all the words in the language sorted by how close they are to the inputted features. Optionally can also include the distances.

Converts the features from a 300 dimensional point to a two-dimentional point such that word embeddings that are close also appear close and those that are not close appear distant. Warning: lots of information is lost.

custom-block.s: display word %txt in language %txt with size %n and zoom by %n
custom-block.comment: Displays the 2D approximation of the word's location in the language with text 'size'. 'Zoom' is useful when displaying many words too close together.

block.l: To see blocks for exploring words leave full screen mode to go to the editor to see the scripts for the 'Word embeddings' sprite.

scripts.comment: This work is licensed under NEW BSD - http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause

block-definition.s: map %'reporter' on each element of %'list 1' and %'list 2'
block-definition.comment: Reports a list created by applying reporter to corresponding elements of the lists.

custom-block.s: map %repRing on each element of %l and %l

block-definition.comment: Language to use for speech input and output only if no language or voice is specified. Can be the language name in English or itself. Or the official code for the language such as fr-FR for French in France. Also used as the default language for the word embedding blocks.

block-definition.s: all words in language %'language' with features
block-definition.comment: Reports all the words that have a list of features accessible via the "features of" reporter block. Data obtained from https://github.com/facebookresearch/fastText

input.options: Chinese English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Lithuanian Portuguese Sinhalese Spanish Swedish

custom-block.s: wait for word embeddings in language %txt %br or use this word embeddings url %txt

block-definition.s: closest word to %'features' $nl in language %'language' $nl not includng %'exceptions' $nl and do as words are found %'when word found' $nl with distance measure %'distance measure'
block-definition.comment: Reports the word that is closest to the features. Uses a distance measure which can be either Eucliean Distance or Cosine similarity. You can choose from among 15 languages or leave it blank for the default language. Optionally one can "watch" it search by adding blocks to the "when word found" slot. The block is passed the best word so far, its distance, and the number of words considered so far.

input.options: Chinese English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Lithuanian Portuguese Sinhalese Spanish Swedish

custom-block.s: wait for word embeddings in language %txt %br or use this word embeddings url %txt

block-definition.comment: Reports a location of a word embedding use t-SNE. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/T-distributed_stochastic_neighbor_embedding

input.options: Chinese English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Lithuanian Portuguese Sinhalese Spanish Swedish

custom-block.s: wait for word embeddings in language %txt %br or use this word embeddings url %txt

block.comment: Convert from 0 to 1 coordinates to Snap! coordinations.

block-definition.s: set pen color to h: %'h' s: %'s' v: %'v'

block.l: var col = new Color(); col.set_hsv(h, s, v); this.setColor(col);

block-definition.comment: LABEL will stamp text on the stage at the given font size. The direction of the text is the direction the sprite is facing, and color will match the pen color.

block.l: var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), context = stage.penTrails().getContext('2d'), rotation = radians(this.direction() - 90), trans = new Point( this.center().x - stage.left(), this.center().y - stage.top() ), isWarped = this.Warped, len, pos; if (isWarped) {endWarp(); } context.save(); context.font = size + 'px monospace'; context.textAlign = 'left'; context.textBaseline = 'alphabetic'; context.fillStyle = this.color.toString(); len = context.measureText(text).width; trans = trans.multiplyBy(1 / stage.scale); context.translate(trans.x, trans.y); context.rotate(rotation); context.fillText(text, 0, 0); context.translate(-trans.x, -trans.y); context.restore(); pos = new Point( len * Math.sin(radians(this.direction())), len * Math.cos(radians(this.direction()))); pos = pos.add(new Point(this.xPosition(), this.yPosition())); this.gotoXY(pos.x, pos.y, false); this.changed(); if (isWarped) {this.startWarp(); } stage.changed();

block-definition.s: display word %'word' in language %'language' with size %'size' and zoom by %'zoom'
block-definition.comment: Displays the word near similar words.

input.options: Chinese English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Lithuanian Portuguese Sinhalese Spanish Swedish

block.comment: Attempt to center the word. 12/2 would be correct if every character was full width.

custom-block.s: set pen color to h: %n s: %n v: %n

block.comment: Display the word centered at the location.

custom-block.s: set pen color to h: %n s: %n v: %n

block-definition.s: closest word to %'features' $nl in language %'language' $nl not includng %'exceptions'
block-definition.comment: Reports the word that is closest to the features. You can choose from among 15 languages or leave it blank for the default language. There is a full-featured version of this block as well.

input.options: Chinese English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Lithuanian Portuguese Sinhalese Spanish Swedish

custom-block.s: wait for word embeddings in language %txt %br or use this word embeddings url %txt

block-definition.comment: Returns only after eCraft2Learn library is loaded
Should only be called by Load eCraft2Learn library

block.l: if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { return true; } if (window.waiting_for_ecraft2learn_library) { return false; } window.waiting_for_ecraft2learn_library = true; let script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; if (window.location.hostname === 'localhost') { script.src = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host + "/ai/ecraft2learn-beta.js"; // notice this the beta version } else { script.src = "https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js"; } document.head.appendChild(script); return false;

if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { return ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); } if (!no_warning) { alert("Any eCraft2Learn command must be run before the " + function_name + " reporter."); } return 0;

block-definition.comment: Reports a list of 300 numbers that "describes" the word. You can choose among 15 languages or leave it blank and use the default language. To learn about these numbers see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Word_embedding

input.options: Chinese English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Lithuanian Portuguese Sinhalese Spanish Swedish

custom-block.s: wait for word embeddings in language %txt %br or use this word embeddings url %txt

block-definition.s: wait for word embeddings in language %'language' $nl or use this word embeddings url %'url'

input.options: Chinese English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Portuguese Sinhalese Swedish

custom-block.s: Load words to features in language %txt then %cmdRing %br use this URL instead of default %txt

block-definition.s: Load words to features in language %'language' then %'do when loaded' $nl use this URL instead of default %'url'

input.options: Chinese English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Portuguese Sinhalese Swedish

block.l: if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); } else { var script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; script.addEventListener('error', function () { alert("Unable to load https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js. Check your network connection."); }); script.src = "https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js"; script.addEventListener('load', function () { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); }); document.head.appendChild(script); }

block-definition.s: closest words to %'features' in language %'language' $nl and include distances %'include distances'
block-definition.comment: Reports all the words sorted by closeness to 'features'. Optionally can report pairs of words and distances. Distances are measured using cosine similarity.

input.options: Chinese English Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Lithuanian Portuguese Sinhalese Spanish Swedish

custom-block.s: closest words to %l in language %txt %br and include distances %b %br do with result %cmdRing

block-definition.s: closest words to %'features' in language %'language' $nl and include distances %'include distances' $nl do with result %'process result'

custom-block.s: wait for word embeddings in language %txt %br or use this word embeddings url %txt

input.options: Project notes Project name User Presentation mode Language Zoom blocks Stage size Stage scale Retina display support Long form input dialog Plain prototype labels Input sliders Execute on slider change Clicking sound Turbo mode Flat design Keyboard editing Visible stepping Thread safe scripts Prefer smooth animations Flat line ends Codification support Inheritance support Visible palette

block.l: var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), ide = stage.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph), world = stage.parentThatIsA(WorldMorph); switch (which) { case 'Project notes': return ide.projectNotes; case 'Project name': return ide.projectName; case 'User': return ide.cloud.username; case 'Presentation mode': return ide.isAppMode; case 'Language': return SnapTranslator.language; case 'Zoom blocks': return SyntaxElementMorph.prototype.scale; case 'Stage size': return new List([StageMorph.prototype.dimensions.x, StageMorph.prototype.dimensions.y]); case 'Stage scale': return stage.scale; case 'Retina display support': return isRetinaEnabled(); case 'Long form input dialog': return InputSlotDialogMorph.prototype.isLaunchingExpanded; case 'Plain prototype labels': return BlockLabelPlaceHolderMorph.prototype.plainLabel; case 'Input sliders': return MorphicPreferences.useSliderForInput; case 'Execute on slider change': return ArgMorph.prototype.executeOnSliderEdit; case 'Clicking sound': return !!BlockMorph.prototype.snapSound; case 'Turbo mode': return stage.isFastTracked; case 'Flat design': return MorphicPreferences.isFlat; case 'Keyboard editing': return world.keyboardReceiver instanceof ScriptFocusMorph; case 'Visible stepping': return Process.prototype.enableSingleStepping; case 'Thread safe scripts': return stage.isThreadSafe; case 'Prefer smooth animations': return StageMorph.prototype.frameRate > 0; case 'Flat line ends': return SpriteMorph.prototype.useFlatLineEnds; case 'Codification support': return StageMorph.prototype.enableCodeMapping; case 'Inheritance support': return StageMorph.prototype.enableInheritance; default: return which; case 'Visible palette': return ide.currentCategory; }
